SEARCH

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
Represents a hotel, containing managers for its rooms, reservations, and date price rates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Hotel(String name)
    Constructs a new `Hotel` with the specified name.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String name)
      Constructs a new `Hotel` with the specified name. Initializes the room manager, reservation manager, date price manager, and sets a default base price for the rooms.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hotel.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the provided name is null.

  • Method Details

    • computeEarnings

      public double computeEarnings()
      Computes the total earnings from all reservations in the hotel.
      Returns:
      The total earnings from reservations.

      Parameters:
      hotelName - The new name of the hotel.

    • getBasePrice

      public double getBasePrice()
      Gets the base price of a room.
      Returns:
      The base price of a room.

    • setBasePrice

      public void setBasePrice(double price)
      Sets the base price of the hotel's rooms.
      Parameters:
      price - The new base price of the rooms.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided price is less than 100.0.
